name: Turbo Bugs 2: Kids
description:
Tired of smashing ants, squishing bugs and exterminating all kinds of insects?

Change the perspective and experience a day of a tiny bug’s life with Turbo Bugs 2 – the cutest bug Running Game for kids of all ages (and adults too)!
See what it is to be lower than the grass and face all threats and challenges that a little bug has to overcome in order to survive and see another day!

How to play:
Run, jump, dash and slide to escape from the mean kid’s magnifying glass that is trying to turn you into a bug toast! Avoid all obstacles that might slow you down on your way to safety.
Take to the unexplored part of the forest and try to stay ahead of the deadly beam that is right behind you.

Push your speed and blazing reactions to the limit, while trying to outrun the certain death! Keep running for as long as you can to save the little turbo bug’s life. Tiny bridges to cross, wide gaps to jump over, deadly rocks to avoid - those are just a few of the obstacles that you need to watch out for while dashing through the forest path in this endless running game.

Tips and Tricks:
Staying ahead of the mean kid’s magnifying glass while keeping your turbo sprint on can be really exhausting! Try to collect as many cherries and melons as you see! This will help you run longer and achieve all the crazy goals.
The special power-ups give you magic super strengths that will help you through the game!
Choose your buggy character and let the turbo race begin!

Features:
- Various Power-ups
- Fun Goals
- Multiple Characters
- Endless runner
- 3D Graphics
